ComicInfo.Summary:
The Grimm Universe has been rocked by the death of Sela Mathers and her daughter Skye has barely had time to mourn before she is thrust into another nightmare. Has the death of the her mother, Guardian of the Nexus, caused the entire Grimm Universe to fall apart? Or is Skye just being tormented by the spirits of her mother's enemies. Find out the answers in this prelude to a new chapter of Grimm Fairy Tales.
*Chapter Titles* Trial By Fire Chapter One: Orphan of the Nexus Trial By Fire Chapter Two: Night Terrors Trial By Fire Chapter Three: Web of Torment Trial By Fire Chapter Four: Rise of the Guardian *List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Paolo Pantalena & Arif Prianto | 1 | B | Cover B | Alfredo Reyes & Sanju Nivangune | 6 | C | Cover C | Pasquale Qualano & Ceci de la Cruz | 7 | D | Cover D | Renato Rei & Wes Hartman | 8 | E | New York Comic Con Exclusive Cosplay Variant Cover, Limited to 500 | Paul Green & Ula Mos | 4 | F | New York Comic Con Exclusive Cosplay Variant Cover, Limited to 100 nude | Paul Green & Ula Mos | 5 | G | New York Comic Con Exclusive Cosplay Variant Cover, Limited to 10 nude metal | Paul Green & Ula Mos | 3 | H | New York Comic Con Exclusive ZENBOX Variant Cover, Limited to 300 | ? | 2 |
